## **A Tapestry of Longing** üé∂

This untitled love song weaves a delicate tapestry of longing and nostalgia through its poetic lyrics. The verses paint vivid scenes of urban solitude and emotional turbulence, with imagery like *"Une bouteille √† la main, pr√®s d'un parc qui s'enfuit"* (A bottle in hand, near a park that slips away) and *"Je traverse un r√™ve, une ville en chantier"* (I cross through a dream, a city under construction) creating a powerful sense of transience and desire.

The recurring refrain *"Si ce n'est pas de l'amour, dis-moi ce que c'est"* (If this isn't love, tell me what it is) serves as both a plea and a rhetorical question, encapsulating the song's central theme of undefined but deeply felt emotion. The bridge's striking image of tracing initials in the fog (*"Comme un fou, je trace tes initiales dans le brouillard"*) adds a layer of desperate romanticism to this poignant musical poem.

### English Translation

```{r}
#| echo: false

lyrics_en <- c(
  "*(Verse 1)*  
I leave tomorrow, and all I do is wrong,  
My heart beats strong under the pulse of the night.  
Only the wind understands me, rocks me gently,  
A bottle in hand, near a park that slips away.  

*(Pre-Chorus)*  
I cross through a dream, a city under construction,  
My heart leaps at every word of this song.  
I feel you, and I want to scream,  
To run in the shadows to calm these shivers.  

*(Chorus)*  
If this isn't love, tell me what it is,  
You know me, from soul to moon.  
I search for your shape in the air, your reflection,  
Your scent in the wind, this sweet resentment.  

*(Verse 2)*  
I know you're fine, that you laugh elsewhere,  
But the child in me wants your shadow near me.  
Your curls call to me, I am a thief,  
A magnetic echo lost in your emotion.  

*(Pre-Chorus)*  
I watch your window, summer envelops me,  
Tropical constant, your memories float.  
I would protect you, hold this envelope,  
Give you all you want, may the universe note.  

*(Chorus)*  
If this isn't love, tell me what it is,  
You know me, from soul to moon.  
I search for your shape in the air, your reflection,  
Your scent in the wind, this sweet resentment.  

*(Bridge)*  
Like a madman, I trace your initials in the fog,  
The sky is heavy, but your laugh is my constellation.  

*(Final Chorus - Soft, whispered)*  
If this isn't love... then let me burn,  
Your absence is a melody I can't forget."
)

cat(paste(lyrics_en))
```
